reference.title: cxxDefineRef
reference.shortdesc: This element provides a C++ define topic type as a link in a DITA map.

section.title: Description
section.p: A <cxxDefineRef> element can contain <topicref> and <topicmeta> elements, allowing you to express navigation or table-of-contents hierarchies.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxAPIMap id="" title="AMap"> <cxxFileRef href="afile.xml" navtitle="AFile.h" > <cxxDefineRef href="adefine.xml" navtitle="AClass::aDefine" /> <cxxEnumerationRef href="anenum.xml" navtitle="AClass::anEnum" /> <cxxFunctionRef href="afunction.xml" navtitle="AClass::aFunction" /> <cxxTypedefRef href="atypedef.xml" navtitle="AClass::aTypeDef" /> <cxxVariableRef href="avariable.xml" navtitle="AClass::aVariable" /> </cxxFileRef> </cxxAPIMap>
